name: Twitch
desc: Twitch or Twitch.tv is a live streaming video platform focused on e-sports and video gaming.

values.user_read: Read access to non-public user information, such as email address.
values.user_blocks_edit: Ability to ignore or unignore on behalf of a user.
values.user_blocks_read: Read access to a user's list of ignored users.
values.user_follows_edit: Access to manage a user's followed channels.
values.channel_read: Read access to non-public channel information, including email address and stream key.
values.channel_editor: Write access to channel metadata (game, status, etc).
values.channel_commercial: Access to trigger commercials on channel.
values.channel_stream: Ability to reset a channel's stream key.
values.channel_subscriptions: Read access to all subscribers to your channel.
values.user_subscriptions: Read access to subscriptions of a user.
values.channel_check_subscription: Read access to check if a user is subscribed to your channel.
values.chat_login: Ability to log into chat and send messages.
